title: Prodigal Summer by Barbara Kingsolver
description:
Prodigal Summer
by Barbara Kingsolver

Unabridged


Description:  In Prodigal Summer, Barbara Kingsolver turns her magical talents to three intertwined stories of a single lush Appalachian summer. A reclusive biologist watches with excitement as coyotes move onto the isolated mountain she patrols, unaware of the personal changes in store for her when she lets another stranger into her own most private spaces. On a farm down the mountain, a bookish city girl finds herself suddenly widowed, her life full of ghosts from the past and her future clouded in uncertainty. In a pattern as delicate as a mothÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s wings, Kingsolver weaves these three stories into a moving tapestry showing the fragile, unexpected ways that all of natureÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s aspects--including human lives--are intricately connected.
